title: Window Blind Sample, ca. 1950
medium:
Medium: synthetic yarns, reeds
Technique: plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 13.5 x 17 cm (5 5/16 x 6 11/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Sample with striped warp of two different blue chenille yarns, blue boucle, two different blue plied yarns and blue flat metallic braid (one mended with plastic tape). Wefts are wide reeds followed by three or seven narrow reeds.

tombstone.epitaph:
